General.Name: Xiamen Solex High-Tech Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Solex High-Tech Industries Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells kitchen and bathroom, furniture, beauty, and health personal care products in China and internationally. It offers showers, showers, faucets, smart toilets, smart bathroom cabinets; and SPA beauty showers, beauty instruments, tooth irrigators, hair conditioners, and smart skin testers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: No. 298, Yangguang West Road, Xiamen, China, 361022
